title: Warm Weather
description: With its 24 ° C you will challenge yourself to the imposing mountains and crossings of Quindío, enjoying delicious Colombian coffee and sweet fruits from the area.

title: Mild Weather
description: It is the perfect wheater for enjoy the trips through small and large mountains, the paths that can improve and challenge you.

title: Cold Weather
description: You will pedal over 3440 M.S.N.M, you will enjoy the stops, lakes and cultures. You will go from the Zipaquirá salt mine to Monserrate in Bogotá.

title: Warm Weather
description: At 31 ° C you will pedal between rivers, ravines, deserts like Tatacoa and the longest port in the world: EL ALTO DE LETRAS, you will measure the mind and physical condition
